about_the_game:
"We Must Survive" is a planetary exploration game that blends the thrill of discovery with the struggle for survival in the cosmos.

In a universe where no two worlds are alike, procedurally generated planets and dynamic events provide a constantly evolving challenge. From lush alien jungles to barren, hostile wastelands, each planet offers unique resources, dangers, and mysteries. The vastness of space is both a promise and a threat—every discovery brings hope, but also the weight of the unknown.

Humanity is on the brink of extinction, its once-proud civilization crumbling under the weight of environmental collapse and conflict. As the last remnants of the human race reach out to the stars in search of salvation, the question lingers: What awaits us in the darkness of space?

Survival is not guaranteed. Every decision, every encounter with alien life or strange phenomena, could mean the difference between life and death. Will you build colonies on hostile planets, forge alliances with alien species, or unravel the mysteries of ancient civilizations? The choices are yours to make—but in the end, they will shape not only your fate but the future of humanity itself.

Are you ready to face the unknown and fight for a new beginning? The journey has just begun, and in the void, only the strongest will survive.

  • Explore planets. Planets can contain anomalies ranging from useful to dangerous.

  • Doge asteroids. Survive random events that can devastate your ship, or help you.

  • Make a colony. Get the highest score you can, and make sure humanity survives.

  • Are we alone? Will you find life and in what shape out there?
